org.kepler.gui

Class ModelToFrameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.gui.ModelToFrameManager

  • public class ModelToFrameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This singleton class holds a map of all KeplerGraphFrame objects and their associated NamedObj models.
    Author:
    Aaron Schultz
